Pride, Passion and GloriaMetallica want the public in Latin America feel special, and for that prepared an exclusive release. 
It's "Pride, Passion and Glory, Three Nights in Mexico City," a work that includes songs the band performed for 3 nights at the Foro Sol Azteca capital. 
Recorded on 4, 6 and 7 June 2009 during the World Magnetic Tour
